recipe.title: Cookies ‘n’ Cream Ice Cream Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 12 ; chocolate sandwich cookies, crumbled, additional cookies for topping if desired

steps.step: In a large bowl, add the cream and condensed milk, then whip until soft peaks form.
Add the cookies and gently fold to combine.
Transfer mixture to a baking pan. Top with additional cookies if desired, then freeze for 3-4 hours.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a large bowl, add the cream and condensed milk, then whip until soft peaks form.
Add the cookies and gently fold to combine.
Transfer mixture to a baking pan.
Top with additional cookies if desired, then freeze for 3-4 hours.
